name: BlackHole Ascent
description:
Take control of a spaceman who is trying to escape the pull of gravity with the help of his anti-grav suit and a lot of space rocks. Can you jump your way out or get sucked into the black void?

Made by the lv20 Mimic Team

Mimic, Artist
Candle King and supervituL, Composers
Draxx, Programmer and designer

Note: Available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.
